creator: sebb@apache.org
text: For use within JMeter, it would be useful to support chaining of two commands, where the output of one command is used as the input of another.

URL: http://svn.apache.org/r1519534
Log:
SystemCommand should support chaining of commands
Bugzilla Id: 55515

Modified:

creator: sebb@apache.org
